td.content: s:patient presents with moderate anorexia, severe weight loss, Cancer. he has history of mild dull abdominal pain. patient is a 72 YO m. he denies drinking alcohol Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 74 in, Weight 172 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17 a:Pancreatic Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

td.content: s:pt presents with mild dull abdominal pain for 2 weeks. pt also reports severe weight loss, moderate anorexia, Cancer. patient is a 72 yo white male retired. he denies smoking he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 75 in, Weight 174 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Pancreatic Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Total pancreatectomy - pancrease.

s:patient c/o 9 days h/o moderate yellowness in eyes. NKDA. pt is a m retired aged 74 yrs. o:Height 74 in, Weight 172 lbs, Temperature 99.1 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17 a:Pancreatic Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed gemcitabine - 1000 mg/m2 IV, and ordered ERCP.
